feed.title: ShinyTracker
feed.subtitle: Lists and displays detected changes on the RSI "Progress Tracker"

entry.title: Progress Tracker Delta - 2022-12-21
entry.summary: Progress Tracker Delta 482 deliverables listed | 2022-11-23 => 2022-12-21 There were 19 modifications, 1 removals, and 3 additions in this update. Please note that not all removals are intentional; there is currently a bug with how time is entered on the Progress Tracker that can cause deliverables to disappear.

entry.title: Scheduled Deliverables - 2022-12-21
entry.summary: There are currently 41 scheduled deliverables being worked on by 30 teams
